name: CTRubyOverhang
desc: Constants that specify whether, and on which side, ruby text can overhang adjacent text if it's wider than the base text.

items.name: case auto
items.desc: The ruby text can overhang adjacent text on both sides.

items.name: case start
items.desc: The ruby text can overhang the text that precedes it.

items.name: case end
items.desc: The ruby text can overhang the text that follows it.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The ruby text can't overhang the preceding or following text.
